nodes.text: A B1-Series battle droid was stationed on the planet of Rugosa in 22 BBY and participated in the Battle of Rugosa.

During the battle, this droid was part of a reinforcement squadron tasked with finding Jedi Master Yoda along with three clone troopers and eliminating them before they reached their destination. As the droids advanced, they hit an impenetrable obstacle, a giant tree blocking the road, and a squadron was sent to continue on foot. This droid and another squad remained with the Armored Assault Tanks, but they were later intercepted by Yoda and destroyed, while he was reporting to Asajj Ventress.
